document.full_text: idaho governor butch otter signed a bill on tuesday declaring the gray wolf a "disaster emergency" in his state, days after congress voted to strip the animal of federal protections there and in montana.
document.title: idaho governor declares wolves a "disaster emergency"
lines_and_colors: idaho governor butch otter signed a bill on tuesday declaring the gray wolf a "disaster emergency" in his state, days after congress voted to strip the animal of federal protections there and in montana.
